alert.note: Alert for Chenango (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 12 at 1:24PM EDT until July 12 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 PM EDT FOR CENTRAL CHENANGO COUNTY... At 123 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Mc Donough, or 8 miles west of Norwich, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Norwich, Guilford, North Norwich, Oxford, Preston, New Berlin, Pitcher, Pharsalia, German and Mc Donough. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
